original_text: I establish my covenant with you, that never again shall all flesh be cut off by the waters of the flood, and never again shall there be a flood to destroy the earth.”
korean_text: 내가 너희와 언약을 세우리니 다시는 모든 생물을 홍수로 멸하지 아니할 것이라 땅을 멸할 홍수가 다시 있지 아니하리라

sentences.original_text: I establish my covenant with you
that never again shall all flesh be cut off
by the waters of the flood
and never again shall there be a flood
